page.description: Gets the name of the active Panel.
page.discussion: You can optionally specify the name of a Panel container (Panel Navigator or Panel Layout.) If the Panel container name is specified, *[js:{dialog.object}.panelGetActive]* will return the active panel in the specified container.

argument.name: UXPanelContainerName
argument.description: Optional. The ID of a Panel container (Panel Navigator or Panel Layout) to get the active Panel from.
